coded_answer.p: I'm writing back to answer the questions that you sendsent me in the pastlast letter, so referingreferring to the question of when I would like to travel, I would like to go anytime during julyJuly, because I have to be in augustAugust back homeback home in August, because I need to apply and get everithingeverything sorttedsorted out, to go intoto college next septemberSeptember.

And accordingreferring to the question ofabout wichwhich type of accommodation I prefer, I choose a log cabin, because I think that thea tent is more messymessier, so I would appreciate it if you give me thea cabin. And my answer to the question ofabout wichwhich activities I would like to choose, well I choose swimming, causebecause it is my daily excerciseexercise, and surfing. Anyway I'm not very good doingat surfing but with a little bit of help I know I can makedo it.

Oh, for last I just would like to ask you how manymuch clothesclothing, and money I have to bring with me. And well, Mrs Helen, I would really apprecciatteappreciate it if you sendsent me back a letter with all the answers ofto my questionquestions, anyway.
Thank you very very much and please keep in contact by e-mail, asor normal mail.
I hope you keepare keeping in great formshape, like you were the last time I saw you, how. How is your family,? I hope everyone is okOK.

Well here in Dublin things are still the same, but I think somebody told you that I went to the mobyMoby concert here at the pointPoint, wichwhich is the big theatrevenue for events and concerts,. I guess it was the best concert I've ever been to, but the coolest thing is that, well do you remember my friend Luke, the one that works as a security guard, well? Well he told me that they needed people to put everything on the stage, so I went to help them and everithingeverything else, and when I getgot intoto the pointPoint, do you know who was there? just imagineCan you believe it, it was mobyMoby, so. So I went to say hello to him, and he toldasked me would you give me a hand with my decks, so, 'Would you give me a hand with my decks?' So I went, and when we finished he gave me a T-shirt and a gold pass to see the concert from the first row, oh. Oh my godGod, Kim, that was the best thing that ever happened to me, well. Well Kim, I hope to recievereceive a letter from you soon, and please tell everybody about the mobyMoby concert and everything, thank you.
